doc.title: Deliver Us from Evil
doc.plot: Award-winning director Gary Lester brings two survivors of the Holocaust to the screen with gripping accounts of suffering, loss, and endurance. Woven throughout the two stories are the faces of those who were doomed, but did not yet realize it...faces captured for all time on color film smuggled out of the Warsaw Ghetto. Deliver Us From Evil adds two more voices to the growing chorus of those who have personally experienced the unimaginable, and warns us of the consequences of hatred and intolerance.
